com.ge.dspmicro.tcpsocketserver.api

Interface IRawTCPSocketConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    Deprecated. 
    Use java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel to manage socket connections.

    @Deprecated
public interface IRawTCPSocketConnection
extends Closeable
    Created when a new client connection is made to a TCPSocketServer instance running in 'Raw' mode.

    Provides connection management methods that can be used in IRawTCPSocketService callbacks

    • Method Summary

      InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
      Deprecated. 
      Get the address of the remote side.
      boolean isOpen()
      Deprecated. 
      Return true if and only if the underlying socket is open.
      boolean sendBytes(byte[] data)
      Deprecated. 
      Asynchronously send bytes to the client.
